comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: This could be EITHER the opening of the Collaroy Beach section on Saturday 2/8/1912 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15339979 - OR the opening of the section to Narrabeen bridge on 13/12/1913 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/15497971. Both articles describe decorated trams, though the earlier one includes "waving coloured ribbons and miniature patriotic flags".
